title: Provide a minimal example
Provide an reusable example
body:
Hi there,

it would be great if one is able to instantiate your component. This means you can have multiple instances of your components - this would require you to get rid of all the static html code and references in your main function (which should be a class).

Some helpful resources might be:
- [Gotchas about re-usability](https://github.com/biojs/biojs/wiki/Gotchas-about-reusability)
- [How-To for examples/snippets](https://github.com/biojs/biojs/wiki/How-To-for-examples)

A good example might be [muts-needle-plot](http://biojs.io/d/muts-needle-plot) or [biojs-vis-circularfv](http://biojs.io/d/biojs-vis-circularfv).

@jmcejuela
